column4: How do i recompile my kernel so that i can boot up properly once again? If i boot up i'm getting dropped to a BusyBox, as it gave up waiting for root device /dev/mapper/mediacenter-root
Am i just formulating my questions in a bad way, or doesn't anyone know?
dpkg can't seem to be used in a busybox terminal
Its probably more that the people able to help aren't around at the minute and may be better waiting 30 minutes or so to see if somebody who can help comes on line
